page.title: 13Dialect 2
page.content: Colin :Ma dad says tae me,"Flick a switch,Colin." Richard:a dae it tae annoy ma sister. She bites me oan the airm! Craig :When a git hame frae skil a watch the tele. ma mum aye says,"Well,whit fettle's the teacher in the day?" Richard:When a git hame frae skil a gon upstairs efter u'v said hiyah. Craig :Ma mum's aye gon oan,"Whit's oan the day?Whit's oan the morn?Whit huv ee been daein?" Bruce :Noo it's win'er at nights it's ma job tae pit aw the blankets oan.Mine's a furry yin. Colin :Ma dad says,"Richt,Colin.Get up tae bed,but a say,"Noo what huv a got tae dae?"so thit a kin stiy up a bit longer,or "Aw,ma feet ur still cauld."
